title: Ep 7: Anne Helen Petersen
itunes:title: Ep 7: Anne Helen Petersen
itunes:subtitle: Author and BuzzFeed culture reporter Anne Helen Petersen — who moved to Montana from NYC three years ago — joins up for a very important discussion about the things we do and buy for our beloved animal bffs. From her must-have product pick to Caroline’...
description:
Author and BuzzFeed culture reporter Anne Helen Petersen — who moved to Montana from NYC three years ago — joins up for a very important discussion about the things we do and buy for our beloved animal bffs. From her must-have product pick to Caroline’s experience with pet insurance, somehow they land on...dog raves? Also, it’s January, so let’s talk about therapy lamps. Also, AHP tells us about a magical place called DOG. ISLAND.


Products in this episode:

  • Ruffwear Front Range Dog Harness: https://fave.co/35ZaczO 
  • ASPCA Pet Insurance: https://www.aspcapetinsurance.com/free-quote#/edit-pet
  • The HappyLight Therapy Lamp: https://amzn.to/2EQNhuh 
  • Blazin’ Safety LED Dog Collar: https://amzn.to/35QOduM

Subscribe to Anne Helen’s newsletter!: https://annehelen.substack.com/

Thanks for listening! Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod

Check out all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

Shop the spreadsheet (updated with new recs all of the time!): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vdIkPMWhV0FlRux3u_DVpuGvakQxkF3EbYT2ZVv45B8/edit#gid=0

Want to get in touch more formally? Email: Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com

Follow Anne Helen on Twitter at www.twitter.com/annehelen  

Follow Caroline on Twitter at www.twitter.com/carolinemoss


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
